column3: Traffic Alert for Newtown Pike and I-75N:
column4: Inbound Newtown Pike is down to one lane at Citation Blvd.  A semi lost a load of batteries and fluid leaked on the roadway.

column3: Traffic Alert for Newtown Pike and I-75N:
column4: Newtown Pike backed up to I-75, and I-75N is backed up to Winchester Rd.

column3: Traffic Alert for Newtown Pike and I-75N:
column4: UPDATE  8:13 a.m. - All lanes now open on Newtown Pike.  Police units are clearing.  I-75N remains backed up toward Winchester Rd.
